name: Steamed Salmon with Broccoli and Shallots
author: Cinderella
summary: This steamed salmon dish is simple, tasty, and wholesome. Serve over brown rice or quinoa.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add shallot and garlic and cook until soft and fragrant, about 3 minutes
Sprinkle salmon fillets with salt and pepper on both sides
Place fillets, skin-side up, in the skillet; cook for 4 minutes
Flip salmon skin-side down and spread shallot and garlic over top
Add broccoli around the fillets, stirring to coat in oil
Squeeze lemon halves over salmon and broccoli
Cover the skillet and steam until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork, about 5 minutes
